sidebarPosition

Source:
src/static/js/sidebarPosition.js, line 1

Uses sessionStorage to store & use the sidebar's scrolling state to preserve position between page views.

Methods

(inner) getSidebarPosition() Method

Summary:

Gets the number value from session storage and returns

Source:
src/static/js/sidebarPosition.js, line 30

(inner) moveSidebarToPosition(position) Method

Summary:

Moves #sideNav.scrollTo to set value of session storage number

Source:
src/static/js/sidebarPosition.js, line 40
Parameters
Name Type Description
position Number

value returned from sessionStorage.getItem('sidebarPosition');

Summary:

Uses session storage to track the sidebar X position.
